data.eml:eml: The goblin spiders (Araneae, Oonopidae) of the OTONGA Nature Reserve in Ecuador, with the description of seven new species

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Duperre, Nadine, Tapia, Elicio (2017): The goblin spiders (Araneae, Oonopidae) of the OTONGA Nature Reserve in Ecuador, with the description of seven new species. Evolutionary Systematics 1 (1): 87-109, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/evolsyst.1.14969, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/evolsyst.1.14969
